title: Clean hydrogen production from ammonia decomposition over zeolite 13X-supported Ni catalysts
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,896-904
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01426F, Paper
Jiyu Kim, Kyoung Deok Kim, Unho Jung, Yongha Park, Ki Bong Lee, Kee Young Koo
Ni/zeolite 13X catalyst synthesized by depositionâ€“precipitation exhibits improved low-temperature performance for NH3 decomposition owing to high dispersion and uniform deposition of active Ni on the surface and in the pores of the zeolite support.
